# Interacting with Loops

## Looping a Launch 
```{r}
blastoffWhile <- function(time) {
  while(time !=0){
    Sys.sleep(1)
    cat(time,"")
    time <- time - 1
    }
  Sys.sleep(1)
  cat("Blastoff!")
  }
```
```{r}
blastoffWhile(5)
``` 

```{r}
countdown <- function(time) {
  for(k in time:1){
    startime <- Sys.time()
    system(paste("say",k))
    now <- Sys.time()
    Sys.sleep(1-as.numeric(now-startime))
    }
  system("Blastoff!")
  }
```


## Testing Human Response Times
```{r}
getData <- function(N) {
  readline("Ready? (press return)")
  for(k in 1:N){
    before <- Sys.time()
    readline("Press Return:") # this is called "Blocking"
    after <- Sys.time()
    delay <- as.numeric(after-before)
    cat(rep("",20)) 
    result <- delay
    Sys.sleep(runif(1, min=1, max=5))
}
return(result)
}
```

```{r}
load("JamesData.RData")
```
